1597770.name: Wizard's Wrath Legends
1597770.description:
Wizard's Wrath combines FPS and RTS elements into VR to build a blend of fast-action and strategic play that best fits the energy of the moment. Wrap that in a deep story-driven world where magic is tearing it apart, and an exciting adventure awaits!

The game includes multiple styles of play and it's really up to you how you approach each situation:
Intelligent monster AI with waves of creatures pouring at you.
Survival - prepare well or you won't last long
Duelling - when your level and courage push your confidence to absurdity you can't help but forget the team and go lone wolf! You rely on fast powerful spell casting, weapon mastery and quick thinking to destroy all in your way
Strategy - when you realise your individual capability is great but there is an army of intelligent, devious creatures out there, you might have to starting thinking too!
Wizard's Wrath combines all the core elements to make a game that switches style to fit the current point in the story or MMO moment.
